before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"59dg8","text":"Conditioned media used in this assay can come from any human cell line expressing ùú∂-synuclein though volumes and culture conditions have been optimised for iPSC-derived dopamine neurons differentiated according to the following protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4egus","text":"dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.q26g7y1jqgwz/v1 and plated at 100,000 cells per well in full area 96-well plates and cultured in 100 ¬µL of media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bmt29","text":"This protocol, carried out according to manufacturer‚Äôs instructions uses a classical ELISA experimental design with sensitive electrochemical detection to provide measure of ùú∂-synuclein concentration in the conditioned media of cultured iPSC-derived human cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7mq22","text":"Harvest conditioned media from cells grown in a full-area 96 well plate, being careful not to disturb the cell monolayer. Add 30 uL RIPA lysis buffer (0.5% Triton X-100, 10 mM Tris/HCl, pH 8.0, 1 mM EDTA, 0.5 mM EDTA,0.1% sodium dodecyl sulfate, 0.02% sodium deoxycholate, and (140 mM NaCl) to the cells remaining in each well and incubate on ice for 30 mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e9sv1","text":"Centrifuge the harvested media 10 mins at 1000 xg to pellet floating cells. Collect the","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"anp97","text":"supernatant to use in the assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3dk7v","text":"Use a pipette to homogenise the cells in lysis buffer and then determine the total protein","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bt7qc","text":"concentration of the lysate using the Pierce BCA Protein Assay Kit according to manufactures","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4nacj","text":"instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fe9hb","text":"Dilute the biotinylated capture anti-body 1:50 in Diluent 49 and add 25 ¬µL to each well of the","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11qj9","text":"provided plate. Seal the plate and incubate at room temperature for 1hr with agitation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7082j","text":"During the incubation prepare the standard curve by serial dilution of the calibrator sample in","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aonv5","text":"Diluent 49. For the highest concentration standard add 15 ¬µL of calibrator to 285 ¬µL to give a","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2llng","text":"10,000 pg/ml solution and then serially dilute 1:4 to give a range of standards between 2.44","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atm9j","text":"pg/ml and 10,000 pg/ml. Use Diluent 49 alone as a blank.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mc8b","text":"Wash the plate 3 times to remove capture antibody with wash buffer (PBS containing 0.05%","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"562mo","text":"Tween-20, prepare in advance)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bfvfj","text":"Dilute detection antibody 1:50 in Diluent 49 and add 25 ¬µL to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fi1d1","text":"Add 25 ¬µL of conditioned media supernatant (prepared as described above) or ùú∂-synuclein","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f59d6","text":"standard to each well. Seal the plate an incubate for 2 hrs at room temperature with agitation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fuq7l","text":"Using the calibrator samples interpolate the ùú∂-synuclein concentration by fitting a polynomial in","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7rv8g","text":"the form y = ax2 + bx +c","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d17sh","text":"Repeat step 3 to remove unbound sample and detection antibody \n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15bqt","text":"Add 150 ¬µL of Read Buffer and measure electrochemiluminescence on the MESO QuickPlex SQ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2spcq","text":"120 immediately","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"71ekj","text":"Multiply the concentration of ùú∂-synuclein determined from the MSD assay by the total volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17coo","text":"of media in each well (100 ŒºL) to obtain the total value in pico-grams released by the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4dkjq","text":"Normalised release for difference in plating density/cell number by dividing by the total protein","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9t221","text":"values obtain by BCA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
